titleStmt.title: The Famous flower of serving-men. Or The Lady turn'd servingman ... to a delicate new tune, or, Flora farewel, Summertime, or, Love's tide.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Eliz. Andrews in little St. Bartholemews Court in West-Smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Caption of second sheet reads: The second part to the same tune.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: little St. Bartholemews Court in West-Smithfield.
